reviewText:
Do yourself a favor and buy this version by Mei Ah Entertainment AND NOT the Studio Cine Vu option! The Remaster Version is 10 minutes longer and therefore the storyline is much easier to understand.

The reason I did not give it 5 stars is because of the incredible stupid way medical terms are being used (like in so many Hong Kong movies unfortunately). At least in the English version.

The second disc, Black Mask II (without Jet Li), is not worth watching.
